description:
Colombia’s President Gustavo Petro said Tuesday that “the coup d’état has begun” after the National Electoral Council (CNE) charged him with breaching campaign financings caps. According to the CNE, Petro…

title: Colombia’s election authority charges Petro with campaign financing violations

title: Why a single company became “the greatest danger to Colombia’s democracy”

description:
Colombia’s constitutional court struck down key elements of a decree that put communities instead of private contractors in charge of infrastructure projects. The decision is a major blow to President…

title: Colombia’s Constitutional Court strikes down community development decree
